itinerary.name: Visit Nairobi National Park, Giraffe Centre, and Karen Blixen Museum
itinerary.description: Explore key attractions in Nairobi.

itinerary.name: Boat ride on Lake Naivasha and a walking safari on Crescent Island
itinerary.description: Wildlife experience and lake adventure.

itinerary.name: Game drive and cultural visit to Maasai village
itinerary.description: Experience the Maasai culture and wildlife.

itinerary.name: Morning balloon safari and wildlife photography
itinerary.description: Aerial wildlife viewing and scenic sunrise shots.

itinerary.name: Shopping at Maasai Market and prepare for coastal trip
itinerary.description: Buy souvenirs and plan your coastal journey.

itinerary.name: Arrive and tour Fort Jesus, Old Town, and Mombasa Tusks
itinerary.description: Dive into Mombasa's rich Swahili history.

itinerary.name: Spend the day at Haller Park and visit Bombolulu Workshops
itinerary.description: Nature and community-based tourism.

itinerary.name: Beach relaxation, snorkeling, and camel ride on the beach
itinerary.description: Relax on white sands and enjoy water sports.

itinerary.name: Visit Colobus Conservation Centre and explore Shimba Hills
itinerary.description: Conservation education and forest exploration.

itinerary.name: Return to Nairobi and depart
itinerary.description: End of your Kenyan adventure.

itinerary.name: Hike Mt. Longonot
itinerary.description: Enjoy the scenic crater rim hike.

itinerary.name: Relax at Lake Elementaita
itinerary.description: Birdwatching and lakeside picnic.

itinerary.name: Dine at Carnivore Restaurant
itinerary.description: Try Kenya's famous nyama choma.

itinerary.name: Beach BBQ Dinner
itinerary.description: Fresh seafood under the stars.

itinerary.name: Nature walk in Arabuko Sokoke Forest
itinerary.description: Guided walk in Kenya's coastal forest.

itinerary.name: Glass Bottom Boat Tour
itinerary.description: Coral reef viewing from a boat.

itinerary.name: Explore Nairobi Railway Museum
itinerary.description: Historic locomotives and rail heritage.

itinerary.name: Zip lining at Kereita Forest
itinerary.description: Adrenaline-packed forest adventure.

itinerary.name: Camel Ride on Malindi Beach
itinerary.description: A fun morning ride on the beach.

itinerary.name: Sunset Cruise at Mida Creek
itinerary.description: Beautiful sunset on a dhow boat.
